title: Session token audit helper
author: Riya M.
description: Adds logging around session token issuance for troubleshooting.

lines.content: def audit_session_issue(logger, session_token: str, user_id: str) -> None:
logger.info("issued session token %s for %s", session_token, user_id)

bugPatterns.description: Logs the raw session token, leaking credentials into log storage.
